alert.note: Alert for Gallatin Valley; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 4:03PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Gallatin County through 445 PM MDT... At 403 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles west of Clyde Park, or 16 miles northeast of Bozeman, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain, winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bozeman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
